movie.title: Wolf Of Wall Street
movie.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
movie.actor: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie

movie.title: The Hobbit The Desolation Of Smaug
movie.description: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
movie.actor: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
